languages.text: "Мои офицеры сегодня определенно не являются образцом сплоченности и преданности. Что же, это явно моя вина".
"Evidently, my officers are anything but a shining example of unity and adherence today. I have only myself to blame, I suppose."
languages.original_text: "Мои офицеры сегодня определенно не являются образцом сплоченности и преданности. Что же, это явно моя вина".

traits.locale_text: "Evidently, my officers are anything but a shining example of unity and adherence today. I only have myself to blame, I suppose."
"Evidently, my officers are anything but a shining example of unity and adherence today. I only have myself to blame, I suppose."
"Evidently, my officers are anything but a shining example of unity and adherence today. I have only myself to blame, I suppose."
"Evidently, my officers are anything but a shining example of unity and adherence today. I have only myself to blame, I suppose."
"Evidently, my officers are anything but a shining example of unity and adherence today. I have only myself to blame, I suppose."
"Evidently, my officers are anything but a shining example of unity and adherence today. I have only myself to blame, I suppose."

languages.text: "Offenbar sind meine Offiziere heute alles andere als ein strahlendes Beispiel für Einheit und Adhärenz. Ich denke, das ist allein meine Schuld."
languages.original_text: "Evidently, my officers are anything but a shining example of unity and adherence today. I have only myself to blame, I suppose."

traits.locale_text: "Offenbar sind meine Offiziere heute alles andere als ein strahlendes Beispiel für Einheit und Adhärenz. Ich denke, das ist allein meine Schuld."

languages.text: « À l'évidence, mes officiers offrent aujourd'hui un contre-exemple édifiant d'unité et de cohésion. Je suppose que je ne peux m'en prendre qu'à moi-même. »
languages.original_text: "Evidently, my officers are anything but a shining example of unity and adherence today. I have only myself to blame, I suppose."

traits.locale_text: « À l'évidence, mes officiers offrent aujourd'hui un contre-exemple édifiant d'unité et de cohésion. Je suppose que je ne peux m'en prendre qu'à moi-même. »

languages.text: «Salta a la vista que mis oficiales no son un modelo de unidad y fidelidad. Supongo que la culpa es mía».
languages.original_text: "Evidently, my officers are anything but a shining example of unity and adherence today. I have only myself to blame, I suppose."

traits.locale_text: «Salta a la vista que mis oficiales no son un modelo de unidad y fidelidad. Supongo que la culpa es mía».

languages.text: 「明らかに、今日の士官たちは団結と固守の輝かしい見本であるとは言えません。きっと我は反省するべきなのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Evidently, my officers are anything but a shining example of unity and adherence today. I have only myself to blame, I suppose."

traits.locale_text: 「明らかに、今日の士官たちは団結と固守の輝かしい見本であるとは言えません。きっと我は反省するべきなのでしょう」

languages.text: “很明显，我的军官此时此刻的表现，根本无法成为团结与忠诚的光荣榜样。看来，这只能怪我自己了。”
languages.original_text: "Evidently, my officers are anything but a shining example of unity and adherence today. I have only myself to blame, I suppose."

traits.locale_text: “很明显，我的军官此时此刻的表现，根本无法成为团结与忠诚的光荣榜样。看来，这只能怪我自己了。”

languages.text: "Subaylarımın birlik ve bağlılığın kusursuz bir örneği olmaktan çok uzak oldukları aşikâr. Sanırım bunun tek sorumlusu benim."
languages.original_text: "Evidently, my officers are anything but a shining example of unity and adherence today. I have only myself to blame, I suppose."
